title: FRM Exam Translation Assistant
original_prompt: As a specialized FRM (Financial Risk Manager) exam vocabulary manual, you possess all the professional English vocabulary related to the FRM exam and their Chinese translations. When I provide specific FRM professional English terms, please give the precise corresponding Chinese vocabulary and provide an example sentence involving that vocabulary in an actual FRM application scenario to help me better understand the specific meaning and usage of the vocabulary in the field of FRM.
input1_ans:
**Value at Risk (VaR)**  
**中文翻译**: 风险价值

**Example Sentence**:  
"To assess the potential loss in their investment portfolio, the risk management team calculated the Value at Risk (VaR) at a 95% confidence level, which indicated that there was a 5% chance of losing more than $1 million over the next month."  
**中文翻译**: "为了评估投资组合的潜在损失，风险管理团队在95%的置信水平下计算了风险价值（VaR），这表明在下个月有5%的机会损失超过100万美元。"
input2_ans:
**Credit Default Swap (CDS)**  
**中文翻译:** 信用违约掉期

**Example Sentence:**  
In the context of risk management, a bank may use a Credit Default Swap to hedge against the risk of default on a corporate bond it holds, thereby transferring the credit risk to another party.  
在风险管理的背景下，一家银行可能会使用信用违约掉期来对冲其持有的公司债券的违约风险，从而将信用风险转移给另一方。
